issues.title: Need better error message than "Require the EXIF data PHP extension to run."
issues.body: Need to explain error message and that it comes from Gallery Hierarchy.

issues.title: Add folder organisation
issues.body:
Add the ability to move folders and images around.
Add the ability to add descriptions and tags to directories.

Add image hashing so that it can detect if an image is moved rather than deleted.

issues.title: Implement storage of images and folders as custom post types
issues.body: Store images and folders as custom post types. Store folders as a custom post type(?) and images as attachments. Use parent_post to store hierarchy information.

issues.title: Add zoom in and scroll through to popup in gallery browser
issues.body: Add the ability to scroll through images with a mouse scroll/touch swipe and the ability to zoom into images with a scroll over the image/pinch on the image

issues.title: Add select and exclude buttons to popup window in gallery
Ability to include and browse folders in albums
issues.body:
Folder album
- could do as option
- have option for including sub-folders as folder option, then when displaying in filter, show images under their folders
- need to be able to exclude folders from folder view

issues.title: Add folder sectioning to uploaded files section
issues.body: Add folder sectioning to uploaded files section

issues.title: List view for gallery viewer
issues.body: Have the ability to switch between the current thumbnail view and a list view for the gallery viewer

issues.title: Ability to bulk edit images
issues.body: Need the ability to bulk edit metadata of images in the browser.

issues.title: Starting... status does not show when clicking Rescan or Full scan buttons
issues.body: Nginx does not properly close the connection when running with PHP FPM, so do not get the Starting... status back from the server

issues.title: Add function to delete tables and options when plugin is deleted
Detect tables missing and autocorrect
issues.body: Currently, tables are only created on installation. Need to be able to create if detect they are missing through  better SQL command error checking

issues.title: Add ability to add multiple filters using the shortcode builder
issues.body: Have a add filter to shortcode button. Once added have an x button to remove it from the shortcode or a click to edit it.

issues.title: Google Drive Syncing
issues.body: Added the ability to sync the images folder with a folder on Google Drive

commits.message:
- Updated README
- Changed so both readme files are generated from same file
- Readded builderOn class in PHP so images are correctly selectable when
  inserting
- Changed doShortcode to return '' if no images - fixes #30
- fixes #31 (previous commit)

Merge branch 'development'

Conflicts:
	Makefile
	README.md
	lib/GHierarchy.php
	src/gallery-hierarchy.php
	src/lib/jquery-ui-multiselect
	src/lib/jquery-ui-timepicker
	src/lib/lightbox2
	src/readme.txt

Fixed scanner js so doesn't display starting scan message on status update.
Fixed gulpfule to include -h option in the tar command
Removed Add New from gallery title

Added readme.txt generation.
Added changlog information to the readme file.

Added delete and done images to plupload.
Fixed default value for thumbnails album.
Fixed error with database creation (concating indexes onto command in loop).

Moved readme.txt and integrated into gulpfile
Implmented removing of folders and images removed from the filesystem (and associated caches files) - closes #7
Tidied gulpfile main tasks list
Added message for start of scanning as a workaround to issue #19
Reimplemented status messages to be a little more information full
Fixed glob for delCacheFiles function (wasn't removing "extension")

- Added ability to pass error messages when filtering images
- Fixed #15 - issue due to incorrect format

Added failure checks to updating database (#14)
Fixed error with bad old $fields reference and key name (#14)

Got scroll working on floater
Fixed 404 errors from packaging
Added production gulp task for temporarily removing lightbox
Fixed ambiguous id reference in MySQL statement

Added symlink for WPSettings.php
Removed debugging

Added image popup selection option and fancybox code
Added gulp task to get ready for creating packages (packaging not working)
Fixed exclusion button functionality
Added option to include excluded to shortcode builder
Fixed generation of basic css file
Fixed floater data alignment

Fixed commented out section in README so it is commented out
Changed to icon for close button on floater
Added taken information to editor
Fixed default dimensions
Fixed lightbox modifications
Added default ordering on taken date
fixed folder filter in shortcode generation
Added debugging information
Fixed links in readmes

Changed browser so could have selection without a selection function
Added a throw if don't have an object to add the browser to
Implemented clearing of selection if remember selection not set
Changed uploader to use Browser for the uploaded files
Removed references to returnFunction in uploader

Fixed browser floater sizing
Fixed exclusion functionality

Removed console logging
Added packery album file

Added info about custom albums to readme
Fixed classes hiding orderes
Added packery album
Implemented toggling of selected
Made so shortcode is updated when anything is changed
Fixed comments field in filter

Fixed basic floater functionality
Started adding options to Editor
Renamed editor prototype to Editor
Removed rFunc reference from Editor

Redid browser so can use it for uploader
Started creating a new way of creating a popup (floater)
Extracted the scanner JS functionality into its own file
Moved to using .bind instead a custom function
Finished uploader functionality
Removed the ability to choose how the directory is stored with the image - can only store reference now
Change enqueue so settings will only be loaded on the settings page
Finished implementing the new directory storage method
Added the ability to delete files

- Reorganised files into src, build and dist folders
- Moved to jquery-folders folder selection
- Got basic uploader working
- Moved AJAX urls to gH global init call
- Chnaged to AJAX-based image scanner (with cron backup)
- Restructured database to store directory separately from file name making
  a whole bunch of stuff much easier
- Added better handling for gluing the comment onto the title
- Added options for:
  - storing the directory reference only, or the full directory path
	- Initially loading the full directory structure into the folder selection
- Added a temporary upload directory to handle upload chunks
- Moved loading of upload scripts into enqueue scripts
- Rewrote the save AJAX handler to start to be able to handle image removal
  and deletion
Changed to use Gulp for building plugin.
Added album using an html5 flexbox
Merge branch 'development' of github.com:WeldCE/wp-gallery-hierarchy into development
Added new module
Updated to latest version.
Fixed bad array definition (from JS)
Merge branch 'development' of github.com:WeldCE/wp-gallery-hierarchy into development
Added modules hopefully.
Adding more modules for more features
Adding upload capability
Minor bugfixes. Finished implementing use included styles option.
Added option for using included styles

Merge branch 'development' of github.com:weldstudio/wp-gallery-hierarchy into development

Conflicts:
	lib/GHierarchy.php
Added basic styles to plugin. Moved include dir into utils.php
Added message about running make minify
Added missed createBasicStyle.php
Started adding upload capability to gallery
Added function to allow albums to have their own attributes in the gallery.
Added jCarousel for new album
Fixed so the Add Media window is redrawn when insert image. Minor bug fix.
Changed URLs

Got insert into post to work for Add Media.
Started adding options fields to the shortcode builder.
Started adding gallery hierarchy tab in Add Media popup.
Updated version.
Move include album files to above database check.
Changed version to 0.1.3
Fixed so will resize image if have rotated or flipped image.

Added database version and updater for latest database changes.
Changed added field in images table to updated.
Added some logging, which is disabled.
Added an option to enable/disable rotating of images.
Added way of clearing unfinished scan job if it fails.
Added check to ensure a scan is not run when it's not supposed to.
Cleaned up and added more info to scan status messages.
Implemented rotateImage function.
Fixed issues with modification file times (now using UTC).
Change mysqlDate to return an unmodified date (localtime).
Added status to save button
Finished changing option names to work with new version of WP-Settings
Continued changes for new wp-settings
Merge branch 'master' into development
Started changing option names for new version of wpsettings.
Added clear selected images button.

Fixed issues with selecting, unselecting and reselecting images.
Fixed ordering when images were unselected.

Fixed a major bug in not checking the return value of parseInt on a non-number properly.
Added a test to ensure printImages isn't run from repage when there are no images.
Added a temporary way of looking at the larger image by clicking on it.

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:weldstudio/wp-gallery-hierarchy

Conflicts:
	.gitignore
	Makefile
Added ability to sync to subversion repository to makefile as couldn't get git svn to work.
Added links to plugin meta on installed plugins page.
Fixed issue with primary key in dbdelta.
Added plugin use.
Change Makefile to add version to produced files. Added produced files to .gitignore
Change to WeldCE
Fixed shortcode generator to build the shortcode correctly.
Updated URLs
Created readme.txt file for Wordpress.org and changed the Makefile to include readme.txt.

Update README.md

Added tagline
Changed Makefile to produce a zip file instead of a tgz for Wordpress niceness.
Changed to use minified files.
Added basicStyle, min and release files to be ignored
Created Makefile to make the release .tgz file
Added a time transient, so can see when the status message was last updated.

Update README.md

Fixed link

Update README.md

Updated links
Made printImage add the class to the link. Created a very basic stylesheet that can be included (with an option) to style the albums (for people with little coding experience).

Changed scan transient lifetime back to 60 seconds - should get an update about every 10 seconds, which will refresh the transient.
Fixed error in the fact that the shortcode handlers are supposed to return text, not echo.
Reconfigure scanning status.
Changed default thumbnail size to 200x200
*Debug commit* Added checking of scheduler to get status of rescan. Trying to figure out why it isn't starting a scan.
Moved activation hook outside of plugins_loaded so it actually runs.
Changed scan transient time to be based on maximum execution time.
Fixed minor issues.

Finished implementing basic gallery functionality. Gallery is able to: search through images, select images from different searches and pages, set exclusion on images, reorder select images, view selected images, build a basic shortcode on the select images / filter.
Added a function to build a CREATE statement based off an array of information so could have table fields available in a array.

Update README.md

Changed URL

Update README.md

Updated submodules list

Continued to implement gallery search functionality. Completed filtering and AJAX retrieval of images. Still working on JS functionality of gallery - selecting and excluding images. Added jquery-ui theme and a couple of ui widgets required for the filtering UI.

*Broken Commit* Fixed issues with printing of images from shortcodes. All seem to be working now.
Starting on creating the gallery viewer/searcher.
Added some todo shortcode attributes
Fixed minor name mistake
Cleaned the main script, so things are called only if the plugin is active
Added the excluded column to exclude images by default from a query and the `include_excluded` shortcode attribute to include them again.
Made it so the image is written to a temporary file first, then deleted so it is far less likely to corrupt the file.

Added the ability to resume a scan (after being reminded about maximum execution times).
Fixed some syntax errors.
Added functionality for parsing the logic searching in the shortcode attributes.
Started a function for printing images from ghimage shortcodes.
Did more work on shortcode handling.
Changed the image column to file in the image table (for later expansion).
Added function and call for importing all the album scripts (and classes).
Fixed syntax error. Added gHisInt for telling if a string contains only numbers.
Fixed naughtyness of having a function in a class called print

Changed attribute logic separator from : to the more normal (and expandable =).
Added a sort attribute (needs explaining).
Created an interface for the galleries to use. Will be used to find the galleries and use them.
Maybe?
Touched up changes to README

Update README.md

Fixed up Englandish

*Broken Commit*
Added URL base variables.
Added options for: grouping images, default classes and appending default classes.
Changed instance return a reference.
Started creating function for handling shortcodes.
Finished get URL functions.
Change resizeImage so you can specify an image name to write the new image to.
Created function to create URLs from URL parts
Added shortcode registrations
Finished thumbnail album

Changed shortcode options to attributes.
Added image selection information.
*Broken commit* Halfway through implementing the first album
Fixed formatting
Fixed an error
Added a few new shortcode options and some examples
Made metadata extraction check for valid value as well as just being set

Changed name of keywords to tags.
Removed debugging in status messages.
Fixed taken time by creating a function to convert from a specified
format in MySQL format.

Fixed where meant strings, but gave constants
Added more tests to check for Imagick, finfo and the folders
Moved Folder Tags option to correct section
Removed issue with adding a / to all files (caused by an empty initial $dir)
More singleton cleaning
Added functions for resizing images
Created a function for creating cache image names
Got registerImage function to work apart from taken date
Changed gHpTrim so it can trim from the start as well
Changed init function name to adminInit
Changed init function to adminInit

Added a status transient to give more information about a rescanning job
after it has completed and increased the verbosity and information of the
status messages.
Redesigned the scanning functionality to make it easier to delete removed
images and folders from the database.
Move options initialisation to the construct function as options will
always be required.
Renamed the init function to admin init.
Created the instance static function for a little bit better practice singleton
structure.
Created a setTransient function for both transients involved in the sycning
process.
Got the folder scan functionality working correctly.
Created a function for extracting and parsing XMP data from an image
to be able to extract data store by Digikam and others.
Made scan functions protected functions.
Created the install function to ensure the tables used by gallery-hierarchy
are created and up-to-date (run by the activation hook).

Added the installation hook, changed to main test to test for the
GHierarchy class and removed the testing lines
Added information about the values of the possible shortcode options

Update .gitmodules

Changed SSH url to HTTPS to make it easier (no authentication required)
Added shortcode options to the documentation

Update README.md

Added submodule initialisation instructions

Update README.md

Changed Todos and changelogs to a link to Github
Started development. Have got settings working and scan partially working.
Fixed .gitignore for Vim development and backups
Added Lightbox as a submodule
Fixed urls and added selection across multiple pages feauture
Added options and links
Rewrote the README to add a bit more information.

Update README.md

Added information about plugin
Initial commit
Added links to plugin meta on installed plugins page.
Fixed issue with primary key in dbdelta.
Added plugin use.
Change Makefile to add version to produced files. Added produced files to .gitignore
Change to WeldCE
Fixed shortcode generator to build the shortcode correctly.
Updated URLs

issue_comments.body: Completed to use AJAX with con as backup
Ability to insert images added. Featured image part not yet done
Due to old column still being in query. #20 fixed in 1eeeda6f
This problem occurs when php has read permission to the images and folders, but not write permission. Need to test for permissions during scanning and alert of issue.
Can't have completely separate filters, e.g. [ghthumb filter="blah" filter="boo"]. Will need to implement multiple filters using logic.
